senses.sense_definition: A person who has a passionate or obsessive mania for freedom.

examples.text: The <w>eleutheromaniac</w> refused to sign the contract because he felt it limited his personal choices.
History books describe him as an <w>eleutheromaniac</w> who fought tirelessly against every form of tyranny.

traits.comment: typically found in literary or psychological contexts

senses.sense_definition: Having a passionate or obsessive desire for freedom.

examples.text: Her <w>eleutheromaniac</w> spirit made it difficult for her to stay in one place for very long.
The author's <w>eleutheromaniac</w> writings inspired a generation to question authority.

traits.comment: typically found in literary or psychological contexts
